snippet.title: The Walking Dead: Empires Playtest Preview!
snippet.description:
Before our playtest begins, let's show you all the new walkers and creatures that roam the world of The Walking Dead Empires!

 ABOUT GALA GAMES 

Gala Games is the future of gaming. With centuries of combined experience in developing and publishing AAA games, Gala Games is introducing new levels of ownership and empowering rewards into the world's most cutting edge games. On the Gala Games platform, you'll find a rapidly growing selection of awesome games (mobile and PC), all of which empower players like nothing before.

Gala Games are generally free to play, with opportunities to get some actual rewards for playing and winning! Create a free account at https://games.gala.com/ 

 SOCIALS 

X (Twitter)
https://twitter.com/GoGalaGames

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/GoGalaGames

Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/gogalagames/

 COMMUNITIES 

Gala Games community:
https://discord.gg/JFxuPmxz5x

VOX community:
https://discord.gg/TezrsSmNZw

Spider Tanks Discord server:
https://discord.gg/spidertanks

 SECONDARY ITEM MARKET 
https://opensea.io/category/galagames

 GALACHAIN 
We built a games-first blockchain to power and decentralize our entertainment ecosystem, with everything that's needed and nothing that isn't. Real ownership of your in-game items, plain and simple.

 BLOG 
https://blog.gala.games/

 SUPPORT 
https://support.gala.games/

 GALA MUSIC 
https://music.gala.com/

 GALA FILM 
https://film.gala.com/

 OUR GAMES 

 Champions Arena 
Collect over a hundred Champions with unique skills and strategies in this epic mobile-first RPG battle adventure!
https://games.gala.com/games/champions-arena

 Dragon Strike: Puzzle RPG 
Collect and battle your way to glory in this addictive puzzle RPG battler created by Ember Entertainment.
ttps://games.gala.com/games/dragon-strike

 PokerGO Play 
Enjoy a casual and fun poker experience where players have a chance to win $GALA in each week's Sweepstakes!
https://games.gala.com/games/pokergo-play

 Spider Tanks 
Embrace the metal-on-metal mayhem in this tank brawler, where even free players can earn VP rewards!
https://games.gala.com/games/spider-tanks

 Common Ground World 
This is Gala Games' flagship project, a delightful farming sim game with the power to save the world.
https://games.gala.com/games/town-star

 Eternal Paradox 
Get lost in the paradox of this unique hybrid of 4X and RPG battling, where time repeats itself every 49 days in a massive competition.
https://games.gala.com/games/eternal-paradox

 Superior 
The super heroes have gone mad and destroyed the world. Maybe you should try to stop them by stealing their powers and giving them a taste of their own medicine. Co-op third person shooter.
https://games.gala.com/games/superior

 GRIT 
It's a battle royale in the Wild West with GRIT. Parachute in, and try to stay alive while the calamity forces you closer and closer to your enemies.
https://games.gala.com/games/grit

 Meow Match 
Collect and match adorable kitties in this addictive match-3 game for your favorite mobile device.
https://games.gala.com/games/meow-match

 Legends Reborn 
This competitive card game lets players collect monsters and spells, then go head to head with summoners from all over the world. Coming Soon.
https://games.gala.com/games/legends-reborn
 
 Mirandus 
The player-empowering MMORPG is still in development, but has already been hailed as the ultimate fantasy simulator game.
https://games.gala.com/games/mirandus

 Battlestar Galactica Eternity 
Teaming up with NBC Universal's Battlestar Galactica, this in-development 4X is sure to be a smash hit.
https://games.gala.com/games/bsgeternity

The Walking Dead: Empires 
In the world of AMC's The Walking Dead, players collect scraps where they can, attempting to survive walkers and hostile neighbors alike.
https://games.gala.com/games/the-walking-dead-empires

 Last Expedition 
This breathtaking and fast-paced extraction co-op FPS is not for the faint of heart. Join Early Access now.
https://games.gala.com/games/last-expedition

 Legacy 
The highly anticipated business sim from Peter Molyneux and 22cans launches on October 26th, 2023.
https://games.gala.com/games/legacy

 Echoes of Empire 
This stunning 4X adventure in space is planning to launch soon, powered by planetary ownership and real rewards.
https://games.gala.com/games/echoes-of-empire

Welcome to the future of gaming!

#gaming #galagames #web3
